value.title: What is the salary of a Power BI dev/ Data Analyst/ Data Engineer? | Salary calculator with Power BI
value.excerpt: Would you like to know if you are getting enough pay as a Power BI developer or data analysis or data engineer? value.title: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression
value.excerpt: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression Vertipaq is the database and engine that runs on top of Power BI and PowerPivot.
